text: María Cristina Schweizer (born 20 August 1940) is an Argentine alpine skier. She competed at the 1960 Winter Olympics and the 1964 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine female alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Argentina Category:Alpine skiers at the 1960 Winter Olympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 1964 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Buenos Aires
title: María Cristina Schweizer
